title: LFT Support Main
body:
hai i main supp. The 3 supports i play is Thrsh, Leo, Braum :)
i am currently Gold 4 but i have supported diamonds in my old team 
I can fill if needed, i also play very well in jg and adc :)
I have skype and a mic :)

replies.body: IM not a bad support i manily play ali and braum im only S2 but ive got alot of exp with team work if need be so hit me up if ya like
we need a decent support in our team, playing games at the moment. we are all gold+ players, one diamond, and one plat.
